February 5, 2025 - Since 1954, the leading global manufacturer and marketer of floral foam, floral design tools and accessories, cellular growing media, postharvest products, temperature controlled packaging and specialized foams.

July 27, 2024 - The company was founded in 1954 by V.L. Smithers in Kent, Ohio after he developed a water absorbent foam to use in floral arrangements. Since then, other products have been developed including floral accessories, cellular growing media, and post-harvest plant products. The company is headquartered in Kent and operates a manufacturing plant there. Corporate offices were returned to Kent in late 2013 from Cuyahoga Falls, where they had been located since 1992.
